name: SRG - MAX SPEED DELIVERY
description:
Commands:  ARROW KEYS = DRIVE

In the future, all delivery services have been usurped by one giant: SUCCULENT. The only thing more widespread than their monopoly is their reputation of wrongdoing. A brave band of delivery drivers fight against their tyranny: welcome to SRG.

You must make your deliveries to those in need while avoiding the detection of the SUCCULENT SENTINELS. If you get caught speeding by their watchful eye, you have to start again.

Seek the next delivery dropoff point using your DELIVERY FINDER. Advance the cause by making 3 deliveries as fast as you can without getting caught.

Good luck!

CREDITS:
